# init(identifier:title:getter:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Intents ](/documentation/appintents)

-  init(identifier:title:getter:) 

Initializer# init(identifier:title:getter:)

Creates an app intent entity property. Do not call this directly, use @ComputedProperty or @DeferredPropertyiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
convenience init<Entity>(
    identifier: String,
    title: LocalizedStringResource,
    getter: KeyPath<Entity, Value>
) where Entity : AppEntity
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `Measurement<UnitEnergy>`.## [ Parameters ](/documentation/AppIntents/EntityProperty/init(identifier:title:getter:)-2lyqk#parameters)

`identifier`The identifier of the property

`title`A word or short phrase summarizing this property.

`getter`The getter reference for the property
